metadata.synopsis:
IMPROTANT: If players help the cub in this dialog, it becomes the permamement camp follower.In SwA, the owlbear cub speaks in short staccato 'sentences.' He's vicious and feral - but scared. He's slightly injured, and playing it up more than it is, and he's distrustful of the player at first. If the player helps him, he becomes excited and runs off to hunt. In the next night, he returns with a dead bird.The owlbear has appeared in camp for a second night.  The player has previously spared the cub after killing its mother, and saved it from a cruel game run by the goblins in their camp.
He reacts much more suspiciously of the player if they antagonised him in their first encounter.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe qnight NIGHT_OwlbearCub2_5cc6fbd5-0b70-4fb5-a29c-9b7ed9e39fcc4. End the day and go to camp5. Go to sleep, the dialog will start

2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player wakes up in a middle of a night because the owlbear cub approaches it

11.speaker: Owlbear Cub
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pecking at his forelegNodeContext: As in: 'There's blood. It hurts.'

78.speaker: Owlbear Cub
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holds out his armNodeContext: As in: 'Look, I have a cut.'

46.speaker: Owlbear Cub
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Bristles threateninglyNodeContext: As in: 'No! Stay back, or I'll bite you!"

132.speaker: Player
132.text: I can help you. Just stay calm.

106.speaker: Owlbear Cub
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holds out his armNodeContext: As in: "You can help? Here, I have a cut. It hurts.'

49.speaker: Owlbear Cub
49.context: NodeContext: As in: 'It's a trick! You're a liar!'

8.speaker: Owlbear Cub
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Runs awayNodeContext: As in: "I have to run. I have to hide!"

131.speaker: Player
131.text: Let me see, or the leg will fall off and I'll eat it for dinner.

108.speaker: Owlbear Cub
108.context: CinematicNodeContext: CowersNodeContext: As in: 'Eat me? No! Don't hurt me! I'm already hurt!'

112.speaker: Player
112.text: Behave, or you'll end up like mother.

101.speaker: Owlbear Cub
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: CowersNodeContext: As in: "Like mom? No! Don't hurt me! Help me!"

103.speaker: Owlbear Cub
103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves to attack the playerNodeContext: As in: "I'll bite you. I'll KILL you!"

63.speaker: Owlbear Cub
63.context: NodeContext: As in: 'You're loud! Don't hurt me! I'm already hurt!'

84.speaker: Owlbear Cub
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pecks at his forelegNodeContext: As in: "I'm hurt. Look, I have a cut!"

36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The owlbear cub extends its injured paw. The player remains standing.

105.speaker: Owlbear Cub
105.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holding out his legNodeContext: As in: "Be careful! It hurts!"

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Hold still. I'll make it better.

61.speaker: Owlbear Cub
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking at player thankfullyNodeContext: As in: "This is good! It doesn't hurt anymore!"

37.speaker: Owlbear Cub
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Stands up to show 'big', then plops back downNodeContext: As in: "Something with teeth and claws. It was bigger than me!"

73.speaker: Player
73.text: You fought something bigger than you? Why?

102.speaker: Owlbear Cub
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: Stamps his feetNodeContext: As in: "I'm strong. I wanted to fight. I wanted to win!"

100.speaker: Player
100.text: Take on something closer to your own size next time.

120.speaker: Owlbear Cub
120.context: CinematicNodeContext: Thinking hard, looking upNodeContext: As in: "It was too big... wait!"

18.speaker: Owlbear Cub
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: BashfullyNodeContext: As in: "No, I didn't kill any."

96.speaker: Owlbear Cub
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Runs awayNodeContext: As in: "I'm strong! I'll show you!"

89.speaker: Player
89.text: Brilliant. Now we'll never be rid of it.
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up and comments.NodeContext: Sarcastic

128.speaker: Player
128.text: The little beast's quite charming once you get accustomed to the smell of rotting flesh.
128.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up and comments.NodeContext: The player has bonded with an orphaned owlbear cub that's joined their camp. Shadowheart observes and comments.

59.speaker: Player
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up and comments.NodeContext: Stars in her eyes, referring to the owlbear cub that's befriended the camp.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: Adorable. Let me know when it brings you something fresh.

124.speaker: Player
124.text: Cute. 'Til it grows up and gnaws your arm off, at least.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: You do realise these things grow, do you not? Teeth and talons first.

45.speaker: Owlbear Cub
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player rubs the owlbear's head. Cub closes his eyes happily.NodeContext: As in: 'You're a nice friend. I won't bite you!'

122.speaker: Narrator
122.text: *The creature coos happily - he feels safe.*

65.speaker: Owlbear Cub
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sits down happily.NodeContext: SFX only - do not record

64.speaker: Player
64.text: Gods. Not even fully grown and you're already trouble.

47.speaker: Owlbear Cub
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Runs awayNodeContext: As in: "I'm NOT trouble! I'll show you!"

115.speaker: Player
115.text: Go on, then. You're all better.

7.speaker: Owlbear Cub
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Runs into the forestNodeContext: As in: "I'll come back. I'm strong, you'll see!"

125.speaker: Owlbear Cub
125.context: NodeContext: As in: "Get back! Don't hurt me!"

35.speaker: Player
35.text: It's barely a scratch. You'll be fine.

104.speaker: Owlbear Cub
104.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tests the weight on his legNodeContext: As in: "It's all good? I'm strong!"

26.speaker: Owlbear Cub
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: RecoilsNodeContext: As in: "You're a liar! You're going to hurt me!"

123.speaker: Owlbear Cub
123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Runs awayNodeContext: As in: "I have to run. I have to hide!"

107.speaker: Player
107.text: Come here. I'll clean it for you.

127.speaker: Player
127.text: I want you out of my camp.

34.speaker: Owlbear Cub
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cub pecks at his forelegNodeContext: SFX only - do not record

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *The cub holds out his leg, revealing a ragged wound.*

110.context: CinematicNodeContext: The owlbear cub extends its injured paw. The player crouches for a closer look

53.speaker: Narrator
53.text: *The wound is superficial, the edges torn and jagged - probably a gnoll's crude blade.*
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kneels and inspects the arm, then stands back up

9.speaker: Owlbear Cub
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Stamps his feet threateninglyNodeContext: SFX only - do not record

98.speaker: Narrator
98.text: *As the wound closes, the cub begins testing his weight on the leg.*
98.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player does a spell, owlbear walks around a bit.

99.speaker: Owlbear Cub
99.context: NodeContext: SFX only - do not record

77.speaker: Narrator
77.text: *The wound splits open further, a fresh trickle of blood spilling out.*

41.speaker: Narrator
41.text: *The cub inspects the wound, giving it a curious peck.*
41.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Looks at his arm, gives it a peck
JLatino: could probably use the pet animation if framed closer, we don't need to "see" the wound getting healed so much as "feel" like the player did a thing

91.speaker: Narrator
91.text: *The cub pecks at a crimson splash on his leg.*

92.speaker: Owlbear Cub
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looks at the player, agitated.NodeContext: SFX only - do not record

86.speaker: Player
86.text: Wave your arms to scare the cub away.

88.speaker: Owlbear Cub
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Runs awayNodeContext: SFX only - do not record

97.speaker: Narrator
97.text: *The cub looks at you with glistening eyes. With a sad hoot, he holds out his paw, revealing a wound.*

55.speaker: Narrator
55.text: *The cub becomes more agitated, running into the forest with a squawk.*

52.speaker: Narrator
52.text: *The cub becomes more agitated, running away with a squawk.*

6.speaker: Owlbear Cub
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player rubs the owlbear's head. Cub closes his eyes happily.NodeContext: As in: 'You're a nice friend. I won't bite you!'

60.speaker: Narrator
60.text: *He purrs and chirps, utterly content in your presence.*
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player rubs the owlbear's head. Cub closes his eyes happily.

126.speaker: Owlbear Cub
126.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player rubs the owlbear's head. Cub closes his eyes happily.NodeContext: SFX only - do not record

83.speaker: Owlbear Cub
83.context: NodeContext: SFX only - do not record
